Tool Call.text: The customer service experience was absolutely terrible. The staff was rude and unhelpful, and I waited over an hour just to speak with someone. The product quality is disappointing and doesn't match what was advertised. I'm extremely frustrated with this company and will not be recommending them to anyone. The return process was complicated and time-consuming.

Return Data.theme_summary: Customer feedback reveals significant dissatisfaction with service quality, staff behavior, product expectations, and operational processes, indicating systemic issues requiring immediate attention.
